title: Rudyard Kipling: The Jungle Book, The Second Jungle Book, Just So Stories, Puck of Pook's Hill, Stalky & Co., Kim
description: The Jungle Book by Rudyard Kipling tells the tale of Mowgli, a young Indian boy, who, after straying from his village, ends up being taken in by a pack of wolves and living among the creatures of the forest.
author: Rudyard Kipling
